document_data.name: ''Staff of Darkness''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''staff of darkness''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[staff]] from the ruined [[Elven Catacombs]] of [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Description: The ''staff of darkness'' was an [[ebony]] wood-carved crooked stick.
document_data.Powers: This dark staff allowed the wielder to cast the ''[[darkness]]'' spell at will. The weapon held six charges.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], a ''staff of darkness'' was looted from the Elven Catacombs by a group of [[drow]] elves of the [[House Freth]] who operated in alliance with the [[Cult of the Dragon]] at the time. The staff was briefly possessed by a drow [[cleric]].
